description: Houjou Hibiki is 14 years old and has a bright personality. She excels at sports, but is bad at studying. Although her father is a genius music teacher and her mother is a famous violist, Hibiki thinks she has no musical talent. However, she has Absolute pitch, and is able to identify music notes perfectly. She also loves to eat sweet things, in particular the cakes from Kanade`s family`s shop. As Cure Melody, her Theme Color is both dark and light pink.
name: Houjou Hibiki
